message:
If you have CPU-bound work to do, then it's best to do it synchronously. This is a poor example in that regard since it does push CPU-bound work onto the thread pool - that's not recommended on server-side apps.

If you have I/O-bound work to do, then you can do it asynchronously. There's no background thread required in that case while the I/O is in progress: [http://blog.stephencleary.com/2013/11/there-is-no-thread.html](http://blog.stephencleary.com/2013/11/there-is-no-thread.html)
